Prepare Computer Vision

Some useful papers on computer vision:

  • SIFT Lowe ‘99
  • Spin Images Johnson & Herbert ‘99
  • Textons Malik et al. ‘99
  • RIFT Lazebnik ‘04
  • GLOH Mikolajczyk & Schmid ‘05
  • HoG Dalal & Triggs ‘05
  • SURF Bay et al. ‘06
  • ImageNet Krizhevsky ‘12
